originalText.text: I was gifted a consultation with Amanda and it was literally the best gift I’ve ever received. I’m a normal mid life suburban mom/ career woman and I really needed to freshen up my look and wardrobe . She is so responsive and really makes you feel like one of her celebrity clients. She found me styles and brands that work for me. After a few hours with her not only did I walk out with some amazing outfits but I have the confidence to find the right looks for me. Many of my friends and clients have commented on my recent “glow up” Thanks Amanda!

originalText.text: Amanda has been amazing to work with. She understands my body type and what is the most flattering on me. She pushes me out of my comfort zone in a good way. As I have started to wear the outfits she has put together for me I have gotten so many compliments. More importantly I feel better and more confident in how I look. I value Amanda’s opinion and look forward to working with her more. I have worked with other stylists in the past and Amanda is another level.

originalText.text: Working with Amanda is the best! She has great taste, really gets to know her clients to understand their style (and helps you feel comfortable trying something "different" if it looks amazing too) and really makes the whole experience a ton of fun! I can't recommend Amanda enough - she is truly the best!

text.text: Working with Amanda is the best! She has great taste, really gets to know her clients to understand their style (and helps you feel comfortable trying something "different" if it looks amazing too) and really makes the whole experience a ton of fun! I can't recommend Amanda enough - she is truly the best!

originalText.text:
My journey with Amanda started in February when a friend told me about her closet makeover. After a long Winter it was something to perk up to and look forward to. As my career has shifted from being in an office, I have been finding myself at more events, and traveling more. Dressing for these things had become pretty stressful and another thing to do on my list. Before meeting with her I was to figure out a budget and my style based on a questionnaire, I found this easy! I walked away with a great selection of clothes for me to choose from and took away the anxiety of what I was going to wear so I could concentrate and divert my energy on other things.
I also used Amanda for my trip to The Cannes Film Festival where I was on the Red Carpet for a few events. She helped me come up with some great looks on my limited budget. I was able to use these pieces for my trip this summer to another film festival where I moderated a panel, and attended a Wedding. If there is anything you can take away from my review it's the feeling of being taken care of and being prepared for any event or life change that needs you to be dressed a certain way.
It was a pleasure to work with Amanda.

originalText.text: Amanda was exactly what the fashion doctor ordered. I needed a revamp of my closet plus new items. She knew within minutes of our initial video chat what was flattering on my body. In person, she showed me that with the right fitting clothes, I could look 8-10 lbs lighter. She curated the experience in a private fitting room and expedited my tailoring and delivery needs. I can’t wait to work with her again on the next season!
